      • addEntry

        public void addEntry(String realName,
                     String realEmail,
                     String replaceName,
                     String replaceEmail)
        Add a single entry to the given mailmap object. If the entry already exists, it will be replaced with the new entry.
        Parameters:
        realName - the real name to use, or NULL
        realEmail - the real email to use, or NULL
        replaceName - the name to replace, or NULL
        replaceEmail - the email to replace
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • fromBuffer

        public static Mailmap fromBuffer(String buf)
        Create a new mailmap instance containing a single mailmap file
        Parameters:
        buf - a string to parse the mailmap from
        Returns:
        Mailmap instance
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

      • fromRepository

        public static Mailmap fromRepository(Repository repo)
        Create a new mailmap instance from a repository, loading mailmap files based on the repository's configuration.

        Mailmaps are loaded in the following order: 1. '.mailmap' in the root of the repository's working directory, if present. 2. The blob object identified by the 'mailmap.blob' config entry, if set. [NOTE: 'mailmap.blob' defaults to 'HEAD:.mailmap' in bare repositories] 3. The path in the 'mailmap.file' config entry, if set.

        Parameters:
        repo - repository to load mailmap information from
        Returns:
        Mailmap instance
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • resolve

        public void resolve(AtomicReference<String> outRealName,
                    AtomicReference<String> outRealEmail,
                    String name,
                    String email)
        Resolve a name and email to the corresponding real name and email.
        Parameters:
        outRealName - placeholder to store the real name, must not be null, can be empty.
        outRealEmail - placeholder to store the real email, must not be null, can be empty.
        name - the name to look up
        email - the email to look up
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • resolve

        public Map.Entry<String,String> resolve(String name,
                                        String email)
        Resolve a name and email to the corresponding real name and email.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to look up, must not be null, can be empty.
        email - the email to look up, , must not be null, can be empty.
        Returns:
        an entry whose key is the resolved name (aka real name) and value is the resolve email.
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • resolveSignature

        public Optional<Signature> resolveSignature(@Nonnull
                                            Signature sig)
        Resolve a signature to use real names and emails with a mailmap.
        Parameters:
        sig - signature to resolve
        Returns:
        resolved signature or empty if resolve failed.
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors
